sources.content:
export * from "./h-stack.style"
export * from "./stack.style"
export * from "./v-stack.style"
export * from "./z-stack.style"
export { HStack, HStackPropsContext, useHStackPropsContext } from "./h-stack"
export type { HStackProps } from "./h-stack"
export { Stack, StackPropsContext, useStackPropsContext } from "./stack"
export type { StackProps } from "./stack"
export { useVStackPropsContext, VStack, VStackPropsContext } from "./v-stack"
export type { VStackProps } from "./v-stack"
export { useZStackPropsContext, ZStack, ZStackPropsContext } from "./z-stack"
export type { ZStackProps } from "./z-stack"

sources.name: h-stack.style.ts
h-stack.tsx
sources.content:
"use client"

import type { ThemeProps, WithoutThemeProps } from "@yamada-ui/react"
import type { HStackStyle } from "./h-stack.style"
import type { StackProps } from "./stack"
import { createComponent } from "@yamada-ui/react"
import { hStackStyle } from "./h-stack.style"
import { Stack } from "./stack"

export interface HStackProps
  extends WithoutThemeProps<StackProps, HStackStyle>,
    ThemeProps<HStackStyle> {}

const {
  PropsContext: HStackPropsContext,
  usePropsContext: useHStackPropsContext,
  withContext,
} = createComponent<HStackProps, HStackStyle>("stack--horizontal", hStackStyle)

export { HStackPropsContext, useHStackPropsContext }

/**
 * `HStack` is a component that groups elements and provides space between child elements.
 *
 * @see https://yamada-ui.com/components/stack
 */
export const HStack = withContext<"div", HStackProps>(Stack)(undefined, {
  direction: "row",
})

z-stack.style.ts
v-stack.style.ts
v-stack.tsx
sources.content:
"use client"

import type { ThemeProps, WithoutThemeProps } from "@yamada-ui/react"
import type { StackProps } from "./stack"
import type { VStackStyle } from "./v-stack.style"
import { createComponent } from "@yamada-ui/react"
import { Stack } from "./stack"
import { vStackStyle } from "./v-stack.style"

export interface VStackProps
  extends WithoutThemeProps<StackProps, VStackStyle>,
    ThemeProps<VStackStyle> {}

const {
  PropsContext: VStackPropsContext,
  usePropsContext: useVStackPropsContext,
  withContext,
} = createComponent<VStackProps, VStackStyle>("stack--vertical", vStackStyle)

export { useVStackPropsContext, VStackPropsContext }

/**
 * `VStack` is a component that groups elements and provides space between child elements.
 *
 * @see https://yamada-ui.com/components/stack
 */
export const VStack = withContext<"div", VStackProps>(Stack)(undefined, {
  direction: "column",
})
